review.description: Great spot, vegetables here are great, sauce is on point. Nice people as well. Highly recommend.
review.author: Antares Y.

review.description: Thoroughly enjoyed everything about this place from the customer service to the food, all of it was great! Right when we walked in, we were browsing the menu board and were immediately offered a sample of their falafel. So good!! Their falafel is almost double the size of other places' falafel and wasn't dry at all, super flavorful. I got the falafel plate combo with was enough food for 2 if not 3 meals and my fiance got the beef/lamb plate combo which was also so much food. Neither of us could finish! Everything was really fresh, not only the vegetables but my falafel was fried to order. Looking forward to going back!
review.author: Michelle N.

review.description: This place is new and very good! The felafel tastes fresher than most places, which taste stale sometimes. The owner is very friendly too.
review.author: Marcy M.

review.description: Delicious, quick service. They were helpful in helping us order and even gave us a sample. Worth it.
review.author: Erin W.
